abilities.name: Interconnected Relay
info: Attribute Buffs granted by Hiro and other allies gain an additional 10% potency while Hiro is in the encounter.

Hiro Connects to a random ally at the start of the encounter. While Connected, Hiro and that ally Resist 25% Special Ability damage. Hiro can use a Heavy Attack at anytime to manually Connect to his closest ally.
Once per encounter per ally, when Hiro is Connected to an ally below 50% HP, that ally Heals 0.75% each second for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Enhancement Protocol
info: Hiro Connects to all other allies for 8 seconds, granting them the effects of his Core Ability.
While Hiro's Special Ability is active, the strength of the effects from his Core Ability is doubled, and all allies Heal 1.5% each second for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Amplification Bridge
info: While Hiro's Special Ability is active, Hiro and other allies gain a 50% Attack Buff for each ally he's Connected to.
Each time one of Hiro's allies is defeated, Hiro gains a 25% Attack Buff that lasts until the end of the encounter. (Max Stacks: 2)
If Hiro has no allies, his Heavy Attack inflicts his target with Knock Back (5 second cooldown).

talents.name: New Titanium Alloy
talents.info: Grants +20% Defense at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: PHC Plugin
talents.info: Grants +20% Health at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Advanced Sustain Module
talents.info: While Connected to a Tank Guardian, Hiro and that ally gain a 20% Defense Buff. While Connected to a Support Guardian, the next cooldowns of Hiro and that ally's Special Abilities are reduced by 1 second.

talents.name: Advanced Offense Module
talents.info: While Connected to a Melee Guardian, Hiro and that ally gain a 20% Attack Buff. While Connected to a Ranged Guardian, Hiro and that ally gain a 20% Focus Buff.

talents.name: Network Security
talents.info: When Hiro triggers his Special Ability, he has a 100% chance to Cleanse 1 Attribute Debuff from each ally. Hi-Tech allies become Immune to Purge while Connected to Hiro.

talents.name: Runtime Optimization
talents.info: While an ally is Connected to Hiro, Healing and Armor granted by that ally is 5% stronger. If the ally is Hi-Tech, Healing and Armor granted by that ally is 10% stronger.
